Articles.Content:
Just a hi, nothing major.

its only polite to introduce yourself and we all come to share our love of ksp. I may not build the pretty ultra efficient ships (more struts and more rockets solve my problems) and I may not be sane. figured id fit in well here.

So hi from me, an average crazy brit!
Welcome to the forums! We don't judge well, most of us don't..., but if you ever come across a particularly tricky problem, feel free to ask.

welcome to the place where kerbal dreams are made... and shattered 5 seconds later... in a firey ball...

anyway happy flying and best of luck!
on a side note first probe to gilly, then hopped to eve. its almost 2 am i should be sleeping...

Hi average crazy Brit! I'm average crazy American, with Spanish on the side.

Welcome to the coolest place on the internets

on a side note first probe to gilly, then hopped to eve. its almost 2 am i should be sleeping...

That sounds familiar
I definitely needed a new addiction like this...
